entry.title: Nov 5, 2025
entry.content:
Hello, everyone! I hope all of you are doing alright and that seasonal depression has passed for you. If not, then you can do it! I believe in you!

It's gotten colder, but thankfully I like colder weather! It means I can bundle up, wear my longer coats, and look like a real anime protagonist! Ok, not really...

Here are the changes for this update!

  • New artwork in the Digimon and Anime sections
  • Added a section with my currently active social media accounts in Links
  • New blog entry where I talk about my grievances with sites that repost graphics without giving credit to the original artists
  • Finally decided to join more fanlistings!
  • Cosmetic updates including:
    • Updating the dark mode colors
    • Adding an icon after external links as well as changing the text color
    • Figuring out how to add line numbers to code blocks for future snippets. This will help in pointing specific lines in any code I share!
    • Moving the Play/Stop GIFs buttons to the navigation bar for easier access
    • Creating a section dedicated to links that don't have buttons. I encourage others to visit those links!!

That's it for now. See you all next time!

entry.title: Oct 21, 2025
entry.content:
Happy Dreamspell Festival Eve! I honestly wish I would make more of a habit uploading my art here as soon as I finish drawing it, but I love making updates to the site as well!

Here are the spooky changes for this update:

  • New artwork in the Digimon section
  • Added a new link
  • Added back the code snippets page! The old snippets are no longer there, but there are some new ones! Check them out if you'd like! I'm hoping to update this a little more frequently!
  • The pixel club page got a revamp for easier viewing, and I added the Bottlecaps pixel club!
  • Added some honeycomb stamp graphics! I had been meaning to add them for a while, but making the CSS took a little bit of work!
  • Cosmetic updates and other fixes, including:
    • Added a loading screen to graphic-heavy pages
    • I removed most of the icons as a result, but only if JS is enabled! They are still there if JS is disabled!
    • Added sitemap to the navigation sidebar for easier access

That's it for now! See you later, and I hope everyone has a great Halloween in 10 days!

entry.title: Sep 14, 2025
entry.content:
It's finally gotten a little cooler!

You know, I can never decide if I like fall or winter better. I always seem to flip-flop between the two. I just like colder weather in general! Not that I can tolerate the cold, but rather, I like to bundle up and wear lots of layers since I never like to show my skin much.

Here's what's in this update!

  • New page: Pocket Bishies!
    • I've seen it around, but I never really made a page until now! The collection might stay small since I'm not a huge nerd and the original sites have long stopped working/updating. It is what it is!
    • If you have JavaScript enabled, you can take a few quizzes to nab some bishies of your own! I won't be taking submissions like the original sites did, but I still hope you enjoy them!
  • New art in the Final Fantasy and Digimon sections!
  • Added 4 adopts
  • Some front-end and back-end fixes, including:
    • Made the guestbook form more accessible
    • Updated the main page to resize itself automatically if certain parts of the navigation are opened. It isn't perfect since I want to avoid using JavaScript in the navigation, but it looks pretty good!
    • Shortened the links for art, changing them from "artwork" to "art"
    • Updated Webrings to use less JavaScript in general. Not sure if I succeeded, but it's something!

That's it for now, see you all next update!

entry.title: Sep 6, 2025
entry.content:
I've been starting to see more shops selling pumpkin spice-flavored snacks, so that means Fall is officially here (I think)!

Here's the spice in today's update!

  • Brought back the Quiz Results page! Since I have a lot of space for more images, I thought it'd be nice to bring it back!
  • Fixed up the installation guide for the deviantART Status Cafe theme! The tables disappeared in the previous update, so I brought them back!
  • Added two cliques to the home page: Cutie Connections and pixel friends
  • Added one adopt for others to adopt! Admittedly, I didn't make it. I just revised the colors and other parts of it, but I still love it enough to share!
  • There is now a secret page in the site! Can you find it? :3
  • Various updates and fixes to help make the site a little bit better, such as adding navigation buttons in some pages.

That's it for now! See you later!
